verses.verse: You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

You shall remember <S%H2142><s%> all the way <S%H1870><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has led <S%H3212><s%> you these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that he might humble <S%H6031><s%> you, <S%H5254><s%> to prove you, <S%H3045><s%> to know what was in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> whether you would keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> or not.

He humbled <S%H6031><s%> you, <S%H7456><s%> and allowed you to be hungry, and fed <S%H398><s%> you with manna, <S%H4478><s%> which you didn't <S%H3045><s%> know, neither did your fathers <S%H1><s%> know; <S%H3045><s%> that he might make you know <S%H3045><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> does not live <S%H2421><s%> by bread <S%H3899><s%> only, <S%H905><s%> but man <S%H120><s%> lives <S%H2421><s%> by everything that proceeds <S%H4161><s%> out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Your clothing <S%H8071><s%> didn't <S%H1086><s%> grow old on you, <S%H7272><s%> neither did your foot swell, <S%H1216><s%> these forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall consider <S%H3045><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> that as a man <S%H376><s%> chastens <S%H3256><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> so Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chastens you. <S%H3256><s%>
You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to fear him. <S%H3372><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you into a good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> of springs, <S%H5869><s%> and underground <S%H8415><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> flowing into valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills; <S%H2022><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> and barley, <S%H8184><s%> and vines <S%H1612><s%> and fig trees <S%H8384><s%> and pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of olive <S%H2132><s%> trees <S%H8081><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarceness, <S%H4544><s%> you shall not lack <S%H2637><s%> anything in it; <S%H776><s%> a land whose stones <S%H68><s%> are iron, <S%H1270><s%> and out of whose hills <S%H2042><s%> you may dig <S%H2672><s%> copper. <S%H5178><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be full, <S%H7646><s%> and you shall bless <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he has given you. <S%H5414><s%>

Beware <S%H8104><s%> lest you forget <S%H7911><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> in not keeping <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and his ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%>
lest, <S%H398><s%> when you have eaten and are full, <S%H7646><s%> and have built <S%H1129><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and lived therein; <S%H3427><s%>

and when your herds <S%H1241><s%> and your flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and your silver <S%H3701><s%> and your gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and all that you have is multiplied; <S%H7235><s%>

then your heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted up, <S%H7311><s%> and you forget <S%H7911><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

who led <S%H3212><s%> you through the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> with fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%> and scorpions, <S%H6137><s%> and thirsty <S%H6774><s%> ground where there was no water; <S%H4325><s%> who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint; <S%H2496><s%>

who fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna, <S%H4478><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> didn't <S%H3045><s%> know; that he might humble <S%H6031><s%> you, <S%H5254><s%> and that he might prove you, <S%H3190><s%> to do you good at your latter end: <S%H319><s%>
and lest you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> "My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> has gotten <S%H6213><s%> me this wealth. <S%H2428><s%>"

But you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> for it is he who gives <S%H5414><s%> you power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> wealth; <S%H2428><s%> that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> as at this day. <S%H3117><s%>

It shall be, <S%H7911><s%> if you shall forget <S%H7911><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, <S%H7812><s%> and worship them, <S%H5749><s%> I testify against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish. <S%H6><s%>

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> makes to perish <S%H6><s%> before you, <S%H6440><s%> so you shall perish; <S%H6><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> you wouldn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
